name: Final Boss (Gcan3)
description:
A prototype game created only to be abandoned and never visited again. This is until one adventurer steps into the game and finally finishes what they are meant to finish. However, the appearance only meant the game's execution of becoming deleted. What remains is answered as you play the game further.

This is a short story game where a classic dungeon style game breaks loose as impending doom of deletion is approaching. Interact with the last few NPCs left to look for mysterious signs that brings up more questions than the game itself.
